hadiths.text: Narrated Jabir bin `Abdullah:Allah's Messenger (ï·º) decided the validity of preemption in every joint undivided property, but if the boundaries were well marked or the ways and streets were fixed, then there was no pre-emption
Narrated Mussaddad from `Abdul Wahid:the same as above but said, "... in every joint undivided thing..." Narrated Hisham from Ma`mar the same as above but said, " ... in every property
